item.title: Greetings and welcome to the world of blogging.
item.description:
I’ve been talking about starting a blog for a long time, and now here it is! Steve Endow, another Dynamics MCT, and I are excited to share our insights on implementing and training with Dynamics GP. My background is in application, while Steve brings his expertise in development and infrastructure to the table. We believe this will provide a comprehensive look at the potential of Dynamics GP for consultants, trainers, and end users alike...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/greetings-and-welcome-to-the-world-of-blogging/

item.title: Consider pricing and marketing strategies for successful product launches in the Asia Pacific region
item.description:
Almost 75% of new products launched in the Asia-Pacific region fail. This rate surpasses other global regions, according to a study by strategy consultants Simon Kucher & Partners. The study, Global Pricing Study 2014, was conducted in partnership with the Professional Pricing Society (PPS). [Image of watches for sale in a shopping district] Globally, the ability to implement price increases is declining. While companies in 2012 could successfully implement 50% of planned price increases, that number has fallen to about 33% in 2014...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/consider-pricing-and-marketing-strategies-for-successful-product-launches-in-the-asia-pacific-region/
